alert.note: Alert for City of Norfolk; City of Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:01PM EDT until July 26 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR ...THE SOUTHEASTERN CITY OF NORFOLK AND THE CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH... At 401 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Princess Anne, or 8 miles north of Virginia Beach, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of , the southeastern City of Norfolk and the City of Virginia Beach, including the following locations... Rudee Heights, Princess Anne Plaza, Sigma, Sandbridge Beach, Oceana NAS, Macons Corner, Pungo, Bayside, Oceana and Wards Corner. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Norfolk; City of Virginia Beach
